articles.title: NASA Invites Media to Launch of Water-Monitoring Satellite - NASA
articles.description: Media accreditation is now open for the upcoming launch of the Surface Water and Ocean Topography (SWOT) satellite, a pathfinder mission about Earth’s water that will use new technology to address climate change and its impact on our environment.
